title: Distributed Particle Simulator
description: One of my favorite applications built in C++ and Visual Studio 2022. The app is intended to be run by multiple PCs connected to same LAN, master server can track the movements of clients and compute/send the next position of particles to them.

title: Piano Accompaniment Performance: One Voice
description: Vocal and piano instruments played by me. Roughly 2 months was spent to master the entire score. 16th notes accompanied by key change was the hardest yet satisfying moment during the performance.

title: Flipnote Animation: Touhou Project
description: This animation was the turning point before I stopped drawing. Even without technical skills, I only relied on sketching to make 50 seconds short animation.
